    • setSiteContentBase

      protected void setSiteContentBase(String path)
      Set the SiteContentBasePath and the siteContentBaseBean on HstRequestContext
      Parameters:
      path - absolute path. It must not be null or empty and it must start with a /

    • autoResolveSiteContentBase

      protected boolean autoResolveSiteContentBase()
      Auto-resolve the site content base bean from the mount's configured content path. This bridges the gap between HST configuration and HstRequestContext.

      Call this method after the mount has been configured with a content path, typically via HCM/YAML configuration or manual mount.setContentPath().

      Returns:
      true if auto-resolution succeeded, false if contentPath was null/empty or bean couldn't be resolved

    • getSiteContentBaseBeanOrNull

      protected org.hippoecm.hst.content.beans.standard.HippoBean getSiteContentBaseBeanOrNull()
      Returns:
      the site content base bean, or null if not configured

    • hasSiteContentBaseBean

      protected boolean hasSiteContentBaseBean()
      Returns:
      true if the site content base bean is available

    • requireSiteContentBaseBean

      protected org.hippoecm.hst.content.beans.standard.HippoBean requireSiteContentBaseBean()
      Returns:
      the site content base bean
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if the site content base bean is not configured

    • getRelativeBean

      protected org.hippoecm.hst.content.beans.standard.HippoBean getRelativeBean(String relativePath)
      Safely retrieves a bean relative to the site content base.
      Parameters:
      relativePath - path relative to the site content base (e.g., "banners/hero")
      Returns:
      the resolved bean, or null if base bean is null or path doesn't resolve

    • getRelativeBean

      protected <T extends org.hippoecm.hst.content.beans.standard.HippoBean> T getRelativeBean(String relativePath, Class<T> beanClass)
      Safely retrieves a typed bean relative to the site content base.
      Type Parameters:
      T - the bean type
      Parameters:
      relativePath - path relative to the site content base
      beanClass - the expected bean class
      Returns:
      the resolved bean, or null if base bean is null or path doesn't resolve
